mapper.select: select r.DESCRIPTION as description, r.ID_USER as userId, r.LOGIN as login, r.`PASSWORD` as password, r.`NAME` as name, r.ENABLED as enabled from r_user r where r.`login` = #{name}

select r.DESCRIPTION as description, r.ID_USER as userId, r.LOGIN as login, r.`PASSWORD` as password, r.`NAME` as name, r.ENABLED as enabled, d.USER_GROUP_NAME as belongToUserGroup, d.SLAVE_PERMISSION_TYPE as slavePower, d.TASK_PERMISSION_TYPE as taskGroupPower, d.USER_TYPE as userType, d.CREATE_DATE as createDate from r_user r INNER JOIN d_user_group_member_attribute d ON r.LOGIN=d.USER_NAME WHERE 1=1
AND r.LOGIN IN (select a.USER_NAME from d_user_group_member_attribute a where a.USER_GROUP_NAME=#{userGroupName})

select count(0) from r_user r INNER JOIN d_user_group_member_attribute d ON r.LOGIN=d.USER_NAME WHERE 1=1
AND r.LOGIN IN (select a.USER_NAME from d_user_group_member_attribute a where a.USER_GROUP_NAME=#{0})
AND r.LOGIN LIKE concat('%',#{1},'%')
AND d.USER_TYPE=#{2}
select r.DESCRIPTION as description, r.ID_USER as userId, r.LOGIN as login, r.`PASSWORD` as password, r.`NAME` as name, r.ENABLED as enabled from r_user r

select count(1) from auth_server_dev.oauth_user usr join auth_server_dev.oauth_user_role usr_rol on usr.id = usr_rol.user_id join auth_server_dev.oauth_role rol on rol.id = usr_rol.role_id and rol.role_code='bmgly' where usr.id=#{userId}
